A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just wish it made a better effort with the questions TFA raised. It felt to me like a reluctant sequel\, as in the hand over was a burden\, and didn't want to frame the story around the answers\, which I get\, but as a fan that's what I principally cared about. That and Luke Skywalker\, whose character was very different from what I wanted. I came out of the last film counting the days to the next one. At present\, I'm barely interested or invested in episode 9.
